meanings: leave a child in the care of

vlive.korean: 그냥 마냥 어린애 같았다고 해야 하나? - 네가? like a young kid. - You were? 듣기 View video NCT : 런찬파티💚💚💚
vlive.english: like a young kid. - You were?

vlive.korean: 제가 따라갔죠 - 어린애가요? And I followed. - As a little kid? 듣기 View video 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) : 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) 13회 - 여자친구와 북한과의 특별한(?) 인연 (feat 엄지 목메임)
vlive.english: And I followed. - As a little kid?

vlive.korean: 어린애가 황달 걸린 거 마냥... You're too young to be looking like you have jaundice. 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : <시(詩)스토리> 9화 거짓말 (Poetic Story Ep 9: lies)
vlive.english: You're too young to be looking like you have jaundice.

vlive.korean: 꼭 그래서 어린애가 무섭다는 게 아니라... I am not saying that I am scared of children. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] 아름다운 밤이에요
vlive.english: I am not saying that I am scared of children.

vlive.korean: 양고기 케밥은 제가 어린애 입맛이라서 약간 어른의 맛이 나서요. I have an appetite of a child but lamb kebab tasted like an adult's. 듣기 View video Dingo Music / 딩고뮤직 : [딩고B컷톡방 딩톡방] 아이콘 iKON
vlive.english: I have an appetite of a child but lamb kebab tasted like an adult's.

examples.korean: Why, it’s easy—a child could do it! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아니, 이거 쉽구나. 어린애도 할 수 있겠어! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Why, it’s easy—a child could do it! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’ve had enough of her childish stunts. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 그녀의 어린애 같은 멍청한 짓들엔 질렸어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ve had enough of her childish stunts. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The little 'uns couldn’t keep up. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 어린 애들은 계속 잠을 안 자고 있을 수가 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The little 'uns couldn’t keep up. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My parents still treat me like a child. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 부모님은 아직도 나를 어린애 취급을 하신다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My parents still treat me like a child. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘Oh, she’s just a kid,’ he said scathingly. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “아, 그녀는 어린애에 지나지 않아요.” 그가 가차 없이 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Oh, she’s just a kid,’ he said scathingly. Add to Wordbook
